comments.body:
it could be probably reasonable to also define `browser` as a property of the Window object, like the existent chrome types from this repo are doing:

https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/0128360a9d2792a80a85842d3608596335b15b94/types/chrome/index.d.ts#L9-L14

I'm not 100% sure if it is needed to be able to define the `browser` property inside the `Window` interface, but it is worth to mention that chrome tsconfig.json also include "dom" in the libs property:

https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/0128360a9d2792a80a85842d3608596335b15b94/types/chrome/tsconfig.json#L4-L7
